column4: can someone help me, I want to copy files into the current directory, but I don't use the command line much, and otherwise it doesn't seem to work because i have to be root, so I sudo instead. I want to copy a directory called for example boxofapples into the current directory. is it like this >sudo cp ///home/me/.arduino/boxofapples/* -r /
Does anyone use the command line anymore ? I dont' use it much
is the current directory one that you have write permissions to?
